example.text: I voted no on the inhumane Child Deportation Act, a Republican attempt to restore some of the most cruel, failed immigration policies of the Trump Administration that weaken our moral standing as a global leader.

I am glad that President Biden recognized this during his State of the Union Address, and I look forward to continue working with him to make insulin, and other life-saving drugs, more accessible to everyone. Sincerely , Mark Takano Member of Congress ?

Learn more about my COMPACT Act Dear , In 2020, I introduced the COMPACT Act to remove the financial barriers that prevent veterans from accessing lifesaving care during a mental health crisis. The COMPACT Act was signed into law later that year.

The disgraceful remarks made by a fellow Member of Congress towards Congresswoman Chu challenging her ``loyalty and competence'' exemplify the extremes Republicans will go to discredit the credibility of those they disagree with. To insinuate Congresswoman Chu is disloyal to her country is baseless and a blatantly racist attempt to vilify a faithful public servant.

As Ranking Member, ending homelessness & food insecurity have been top priorities for [[user]] and I'm very concerned that today's expiring public health authorities will put us back to where we were three years ago: maintaining the status quo with fewer effective tools.

I voted no on the inhumane Child Deportation Act, a Republican attempt to restore some of the most cruel, failed immigration policies of the Trump Administration that weaken our moral standing as a global leader.
